oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John M. McFarlane correspondence, 1914 December 14
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: McFarlane, John M.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter dated 1914 December 14, from Private John M. McFarlane informing his commanding officer of his address for payment of wages before he and two other Privates sail.
